article:
{{multiple issues|


}}

The '[[demographics|demographic]] features of the population of [[Kosovo]]',
includes various factors such as population density, ethnicity, education level,
health of the populace, economic status, religious affiliations and other
aspects of the population. The dominant ethnic group is Albanian, with
significant minorities of Serbs and others.

The final results of the 2011 Census recorded Kosovo as having a population of
1,739,825 (excluding North Kosovo). [http://esk.rks-
gov.net/rekos2011/?cid=1,92 Final Results of the 2011 Kosovo census]
